education.degree: BACHELOR OF SCIENCE, MATHEMATICAL FINANCE & STATISTICS

certifications.name: Chartered Financial Analyst Level III Candidate
Artificial Intelligence: Implications for Business Strategy

summary: Accomplished strategic leader with 15+ years of experience in financial services and technology. Proven track record of driving digital transformation, leveraging AI and data analytics to deliver customer-centric solutions. Extensive knowledge of product development life cycle, technical design, and change management. Recognized thought leader in AI and machine learning applications for business strategy.

experience.title: INTEGRATION LEAD - OPERATIONAL RISK
responsibilities: Lead Delegate for the integration of Heritage First Republic with JPMorgan Consumer and Community Banking for Risk and Control Observations
Ensured disposition of the 100+ control and process risks as identified in Archer and CORE for operational risks expected to be resolved prior to integration
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and implement risk mitigation strategies
Monitored progress and reported on the status of risk remediation efforts to senior leadership

experience.title: STRATEGIC PRIORITIES - DIRECTOR, DIGITAL OPERATIONAL RISK
responsibilities: Reconciled risk and control operations by utilizing electronic digital documentation tools such as DocuSign, CLM tools including SpringCRM, archive tools such as OnBase, and AI tools including Instabase and Ephesoft
Rationalized and integrated the fragmented ecosystem that was installed as one-off tools for one-off projects

Joined 2 of the organization's 6 strategic priorities for the 2023 year, which included operational process mapping and rationalization across LOBs, and the front office client onboarding transformation program utilizing Salesforce
Represented the documentation component and integration for the client onboarding transformation program

experience.title: CONSULTING – DIRECTOR, FINANCIAL SERVICES CLIENT ADVISORY
responsibilities: Led the vision and strategy for the Global Financial Services Industry, establishing targets and driving overall growth
Advised senior business leaders on leveraging AI and data analytics for business and technology transformations
Partnered with account leaders to develop growth plans and drive accountability, resulting in 30% YoY revenue growth
Drove connections and strategy with Global Partners to enhance client service and expand market share

experience.title: PROGRAM MANAGEMENT – DIRECTOR, ENTERPRISE DIGITIZATION
responsibilities: Deployed AI capabilities through agile methodology to support LIBOR Transition Office and Enterprise Contract Management
Led digitization ecosystem of 200+ team members, leveraging OCR, RPA, ML, NLP and AI to centralize processes
Worked with impacted LOBs to source client agreements and extend BAU, driving efficiency and risk reduction
Reconciled Agreements to Positions across multiple lending and commercial booking platforms

experience.title: PRODUCT OWNER – DIRECTOR, CORPORATE BANKING OPERATIONS
responsibilities: Managed team of 25 and served as liaison across Credit, Onboarding, Sales, Legal and Technology departments
Owned documentation solutions such as DocuSign, Documentum, Salesforce, and Seal Software (now DocuSign Insight)
Led documentation programs for regulations like Dodd-Frank, driving compliance and operational efficiency
Introduced Tableau dashboards to track KPIs, improving data-driven decision making and performance

experience.title: SALES - VICE PRESIDENT, INTEREST RATE DERIVATIVES
responsibilities: Introduced hedging solutions to clients, building effective portfolios to manage risk
Identified cross-sell opportunities to deepen client relationships, generating $10M+ in incremental revenue
Maximized client experience through proactive market updates and thought leadership

experience.title: STAFF AUDITOR
responsibilities: Audited defined contribution and defined benefit retirement plans, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements
Performed general financial audits and reviews, identifying areas for improvement and providing recommendations to clients
Collaborated with senior auditors to plan and execute audit engagements efficiently and effectively
Developed strong working relationships with clients, demonstrating professionalism and attention to detail
Assisted in the preparation of audit reports and presentations for clients and firm leadership
